title: Mick Cleary's verdict: Superb England shoved All Blacks off their perch with this, their finest-ever victory
text:
O, William Webb Ellis, O, William Shakespeare, O, Winston Churchill – your boys did you proud. A Land of Hope and Glory now beckons for England, into a World Cup final with all those rich possibilities dangling in front of them. Eddie Jones wanted his side to create history by knocking New Zealand off their perch. And it wasn’t a nudge that they gave the All Blacks. It was a bloomin’ great wallop in the ribs, reducing the world’s most accomplished team to not just mere mortals but also-rans. The victory was more emphatic than the scoreboard indicates.

Eddie Jones wanted his side to create history. And they have. They had never beaten New Zealand at a World Cup. This was only their second win...
description: O, William Webb Ellis, O, William Shakespeare, O, Winston Churchill – your boys did you proud.
